help browser functions helpbrowser >>

doc

Displays documentation.

Syntax

doc
doc function_name
doc('function_name')

Input argument

function_name

a string: function name

Description

doclaunches help browser.

doc('function_name')displays the help about function designed by 'function_name'.

Examples

doc()


doc sin


doc is

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
